Human Resources (HR) Internship (Hybrid)StoreHub (Thailand) Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
Series A+ funding SEA fast growing Tech Start Up
Many opportunities for growth/development!
Hybrid Internship (Home+Office)If you seek to experience Human Resources (HR) in action in a fast paced, multinational Tech Startup ecosystem, the opportunity is here.

We are looking for young, humble & hungry talent who are committed to learn & grow together as a “Pro-Sports team”.

In this HR internship role, you will have an opportunity to learn about main HR fundamentals in a unique professional business environment. There are many dimensions to HR responsibilities to explore, such as Talent Acquisition, Engagement, Training & Development and Administration etc. You could potentially experience these areas depending on the business strategy and your ability to learn. In addition, there's a mixture of routine, admin & project based tasks. All in order to drive StoreHub to one of the core visions in “Building A Place Where People Thrive”

 StoreHub's Mission
With 15,000 customers in over 15 countries, StoreHub's mission is to make business awesome for everyone by providing retail and restaurant businesses the technology and services they need to succeed.
At StoreHub, we believe that technology is essential for businesses to survive and thrive in today's fast-changing world. We also believe that equal access to technology is a fundamental right. That's why we’re committed to bridging this gap and making technology accessible to all, regardless of their background. By focusing on serving needs, not just profit, we level the playing field for those who have been marginalized. Our customers trust us with the success of their businesses, and we play to win by enabling everyone to build successful businesses.
Internship Descriptions: 

1. Talent Acquisition

Engage candidates via multiple sourcing options and techniques to build an ongoing talent pool, while effectively identifying and sharing promising profiles of candidates with Hiring Managers.
Gather position requirements, formulate job scopes, promote open positions, do lead sourcing, filtering, assessments.
Align and apply the TA strategies, processes, and recruitment methodologies

2. HR Projects

Actively collaborate on HR business strategy projects with a multiple stakeholders
Designing, developing, and implementing People-related processes, policies, and experiences. To create business solutions with HR fundamentals. Such as, Talent Acquisition, Engagement, Training & Development and Administration etc. 

3. HR administrations

Support necessary HR Documentations/Administrations

Requirements:

Passion in HR: Strong passion in “learning” about HR work scope.
Great Communication Skills: main responsibility is to communicate with candidates & employees from different styles & backgrounds, you need to be able to listen to understand and clearly communicate. Fluent in Thai and good command in English.
Responsible & Reliable: Able to independently manage multiple tasks concurrently in a quality based & timely manner. Ability to handle sensitive and confidential matters with discretion
High Adaptability/flexibility: The ability to work through ambiguity, adapt to fast paced changing priorities and needs, open to do routine, admin and project based work, while handling multiple tasks with a positive, can-do attitude
Important Notes:

Open for all level of University Students and recent Graduates
Hybrid internship arrangement (Home + Office)
Can intern at least 3-4 business days / week
Internship period: Jan - March 2024 (Open for discussion)
Office located near BTS Chong Nonsi
Shortlist applicants will be contacted within 7 days since applied.undefined

Experience in E-Commerce / Retail Stock Management
Proficient in Data analysis and Dynamic Timelines
Familiar with Fulfillment ProcessesJob Description:

I. Warehouse Operations Management:

Oversee all operational aspects of fulfillment, controlling, and managing inventory and logistics.
To manage the receiving, handling, storing, picking, and packing activities of internal / external warehouse, ensuring that quality standards are met or exceeded.
Tracking inventory levels to prevent stock-outs and/or dead-stock.
Ensure that the warehouse operates at peak efficiency and manage operational goals.
Coordinate with teams & warehouses to perform quarterly physical count.

II. Inventory Management:

Maintain accurate inventory records and conduct regular R\reconcile cycle count with internal teams and external partners to resolve discrepancies.
Provide monthly order forecasting to Sales and Business Development team for inbound and outbound order preparation
Monitor and control aging stocks, slow-moving and non-moving items, and plan for proactive actions in order to prevent excess stocks and minimize inventory disposal
Coordinate with Warehouse team, BD team, Product team and Sales team to ensure that product will be well received at warehouse & stores within launch date
Coordinate with internal teams in product testing, inventory control of return/exchange/ replacement of faulty products.
Ensures adequate inventory levels are maintained to maximize internal/external team satisfaction 

III. Quality Control & Improvement:

Implement quality control measures to ensure current process that meet company goals.
Identify opportunities for process optimization and cost-saving initiatives within the warehouse.
Implement improvements to streamline operations and enhance overall efficiency.
Verify, monitor monthly expenses and provide improvement analysis for budget controlling.
Initiate improvement, cost saving projects and special assignments from management team.

Job Qualification :

Bachelor’s degree or above in Supply Chain Management,  Engineering or related fields.
Experience in Fulfillment / Inventory (Stock) / Warehouse Operations for at least 5 years. (Experience in E-Commerce/Retail will be an advantage.)
Proven track record of analytical, coordination, leadership, and project management skills
Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Powerpoint, Excel, etc.), inventory / Stock / Inventory management systems.
Strong business acumen and dynamic working style
Extremely Detail-oriented with a keen eye for discrepancies
Comfortable with coordinating extensively and possess proficient multitasking capabilities
Good logicals and analytical skills
Excellent problem solving and decision making skills
Able to work near MRT Ladpraoundefined

People & Culture /People Experience /HR Generalist
Experience in Tech/start up company is a plus
Work with multi-nationals teamWe create long-term impact through technology.

We are a team of passionate software engineers, product managers, and designers that enjoy building outstanding web and mobile applications.

Millions of people use our apps. We work for companies of all sizes; from 1-person startups to Fortune 500 enterprises. We take a collaborative and product development approach, creating custom software that people will love to use and solving our clients' problems so that they can focus on what they do best - better.

If you want to grow together, work on challenging products and enjoy using the best tools and practices, Nimble is the right place for you! We keep our recruitment process practical and straightforward.

What You Will Do

Become the first advocate for our company’s culture internally and externally.
Make sure all Nimble's have the best employee experience throughout their journeys with Nimble
Responsible for the administrative work of People Operations, including but not limited to:
Prepare Visa, work permit and 90 days notification for ex-pats employee
Arrange travel by booking tickets, accommodation, logistics and managing employee-related expenses
Manage employee benefits including SSO, health insurance, provident fund, education allowance, WFH allowance
Support employee engagement activities and facilitate all company's events
Coordinate with our Talent Acquisition team to perform at its best shaping our company’s culture and employer branding

Why You'll Love Working Here

You will be proud of any product that has our name on it.
You will work with a high-performance team catalyzing your full potential.
We are a bootstrapped profitable business from day 1.
We pay attention and care about processes, high quality, and aesthetics.
We match your monthly contribution to the Provident Fund (see more detailed info).
Private medical insurance (Allianz) from day one, and social welfare coverage.
Comfortable and modern office space environment in the heart of Bangkok next to BTS Asoke and MRT Sukhumvit (Interchange 21).
Our office kitchen is fully stocked with drinks and snacks for the team.
25 days of paid leaves/year (13 public holidays + 12 personal days).
Sabbatical month every 3 years.
Company outing every year.
Many more perks!

Requirements

At least 5 years of experience in Human Resources and/or People Operations
Experience in employer branding, retention management, and employee relations are essential
Good knowledge of Learning & Development, Compensation & Benefits and Thai Labor Law.
Good experience in Visa and Work Permit is a strong plus.
You are genuinely people-oriented with outgoing personality, you go out of your way to meet and engage with people inside and outside the company. To get to know people and learning about what drives them in order to look for ways to help them make progress in their life.
Versatility in order to adapt how you, your team, and our people ops related initiatives work. Also, to ensure that our company over-delivers despite adverse situations (e.g. COVID-19).
A driven and self-starter attitude. You look for ways to improve yourself and learn every day.
Excellent spoken and written English.

QC Pharmacist
Pharmacist
QCงานด้านการควบคุมคุณภาพ

        ควบคุมและทดสอบวัตถุดิบ วัสดุการบรรจุ ผลิตภัณฑ์รอการบรรจุ และยาสำเร็จรูป ทั้งทางเคมีและทางจุลชีววิทยา ให้มั่นใจว่ามีการทดสอบทุกอย่างที่จำเป็นเพื่อคุณภาพของผลิตภัณฑ์ที่ดี
        ควบคุมวิธีการสุ่มตัวอย่าง วิธีการทดสอบวัตถุดิบ, วัสดุการบรรจุ, ผลิตภัณฑ์รอบรรจุ และยาสำเร็จรูป
        ประเมินบันทึกการตรวจสอบ การตรวจวิเคราะห์ พิจารณาประเมินข้อมูลที่ได้จากการทดสอบ ให้มั่นใจว่าผลทดสอบผ่านตามข้อกำหนด
        ทบทวนและรับรองเอกสารผลการตรวจสอบวัตถุดิบ, วัสดุการบรรจุ, ผลิตภัณฑ์รอบรรจุ และยาสำเร็จรูป

งานด้านระบบคุณภาพ

        จัดทำหรือทบทวนเอกสารคุณภาพต่างๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับฝ่าย เช่น QP, SOP
        ดูแลและควบคุมให้พนักงานในฝ่ายปฏิบัติตามข้อกำหนดมาตรฐานต่างๆ ในระบบคุณภาพ ฯลฯ

งานร่วมกับฝ่ายอื่นๆ

        ดำเนินการร่วมกับฝ่ายผลิตในการตรวจติดตามการปนเปื้อนของเชื้อจุลินทรีย์ เพื่อควบคุมสภาวะแวดล้อมในการผลิต
        ดำเนินการร่วมกับฝ่ายซัพพลายเชนและฝ่ายประกันคุณภาพในการจัดการผลิตภัณฑ์ที่ได้รับคืนจากลูกค้า
        ดำเนินการร่วมกับฝ่ายซัพพลายเชน/แผนกจัดซื้อในการจัดหาวัสดุ อุปกรณ์ สารเคมีต่างๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการปฏิบัติงาน
คุณสมบัติ

        จบการศึกษาปริญญาตรีเภสัชศาสตร์บัณฑิต
        มีใบประกอบวิชาชีพเภสัชกรรมและสามารถแขวนป้ายทำงานทันทีที่เริ่มงาน
        ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่
        มีทักษะ/ความรู้เกี่ยวกับงานวิเคราะห์ (QC) และการใช้งานเครื่อง GC และ HPLC
        มีความละเอียดรอบคอบ มีความรับผิดชอบสูง และมีทักษะการคิดวิเคราะห์
        มีทักษะคอมพิวเตอร์ และ Program Microsoft Office
        ISO 9001:2000, ISO 13485 จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นกรณีพิเศษundefined

Description

รับเรื่องร้องเรียน และประสานงานเพื่อแก้ไขปัญหาของลูกค้า
ควบคุม ดูแลระบบสมาชิก เช่น แบบฟอร์มการสมัคร การคีย์ การตรวจสอบความถูกต้อง และการแก้ไขข้อมูลสมาชิก
ควบคุม ดูและระบบสิทธิประโยชน์ของสมาชิก เช่น ระบบการสะสมและแลกแต้ม เป็นต้น
ประสานงาน และจัดทำสื่อประชาสัมพันธ์เกี่ยวกับสิทธิประโยชน์สมาชิก
ประสานงานกับทีมต่าง ๆ เรื่องการประชาสัมพันธ์สิทธิประโยชน์ของสมาชิกทั้งเก่าและใหม่
ดูแลระบบการรักษาฐานลูกค้าเก่า และการเพิ่มฐานลูกค้าใหม่
จัดทำรายงานประจำสัปดาห์ และประจำเดือน เช่น ข้อมูลจำนวนสมาชิก สิทธิประโยชน์ และอื่น ๆ
ศึกษา อัพเดท เปรียบเทียบข้อมูล เกี่ยวกับพฤติกรรมของสมาชิก และลูกค้า เพื่อพัฒนาระบบสมาชิก
ปฏิบัติงานอื่น ๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย

Requirement

ปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขาบริหารธุรกิจ บัญชี การเงิน การตลาด เศรษฐศาสตร์ หรือสาขาวิชาอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง
มีประสบการณ์การทำงานด้านการตลาด หรือมีประสบการณ์ตรงด้านการนำเสนอผลิตภัณฑ์ให้ลูกค้า หรือด้านการบริหารลูกค้าสัมพันธ์ หรือ Call Center

School CounselorBASIS International School BangkokJob Highlights
Degree in psychology, social work or counseling
Ability to build and strengthen positive relations
Strong communication skillsDirect Focus
The School Counselor serves as a resource to the school, focusing on both faculty/staff and parent support to assist with interventions in academic and emotional situations. This position is a visible presence in all areas of the school, and is responsible for issues relating to the well-being of the students at the school.


Job Responsibilities


Provide short-term school based counseling (individual or group setting).
Facilitate peer mediation and restorative conferences.
Support the development and implementation of the social emotional learning curriculum across the school.
Offer guidance and strategies to teachers and parents for supporting students with a variety of social and emotional issues, including implementing behavior plans as needed.
Make recommendations for outside support on an as needed basis.
Prevent, assess, and intervene in crisis situations.
Act as a member of the school crisis management and response team.
Create educational workshops for the school community on an as-needed basis.
Assist the school team in reviewing requests for reasonable accommodations and, if appropriate, contacting their outside support specialists.
Maintain accurate records when communicating with students, parents and teachers about intervention plans, reasonable accommodations and progress reports.
Build positive relationships within the school community.
Qualifications and Personal attributes

Bachelor’s Degree or Master's Degree in psychology, social work or counseling.

Experience (3-5 years) working with middle and high school students in a professional setting.
Possess a strong belief in and adherence to the BASIS Curriculum.
Demonstrate the desired school culture by creating a joyful, loving, respectful, safe, and supportive learning environment and instilling a love of learning and an expectation of high academic performance in every student.
Maintain high level of customer satisfaction by demonstrating active listening, empathy, problem-solving, follow-through and clear communication.
Have an ability to build and strengthen positive relationships among students, parents, and teachers.
Have an ability to exercise excellent judgment and decision making.
Have exemplary organizational skills along with the ability to establish and manage multiple caseloads.
Have excellent oral and written communication skills.
Maintain patience, flexibility and a sense of humor.
Individual must have a willingness to develop and implement a new position/program.
Individual has a background with implementing or developing Social Emotional Learning Programming.
Interested candidates please submit application letter with expected remuneration and resume to Human Resources Department.


Only shortlisted applicants will be contacted. Interview will be conducted in English.undefined

School NurseKing's College International School BangkokJob Highlights
Provide first aid care
Organise all the medical information and resources
Best practice in the health and first aid serviceKing’s College International School Bangkok is quickly growing to establish itself as one of the best schools in Bangkok. We are now looking for an outstanding nurse to work with our current nurses to help organize and deliver outstanding care for the school community. 

We believe in treating each other with kindness and good manners at all times. Due to the international nature of our community, the school nurse will need to speak, read and write both Thai and English to a good standard, be very well organised and have a passion for customer service.  

Duties and Responsibilities

Provide first aid care to the community in the international environment.
Maintain standard of best practice in the health and first aid service.
Administer medication per prescription or per parents’ instructions.
Communicate effectively with parents to inform them of any accidents or emergencies.
Record the information into the system and treat as confidential. 
Ensure the medical unit is: equipped with emergency equipment; and compliant with international standards for cleanliness and hygiene.
Ensure that students’ medical and allergy information is updated continually, which includes: Interviewing every new student who has a medical issue or allergy to fully understand the issue and ensure that support is put in place for each individual.
Track infections and outbreaks and inform the heads of school so that suitable action can be taken.
Liaise with the estate team to ensure appropriate cleaning of infected areas.
Ensuring that all medical and allergy information is in the school information management system and accessible to the relevant staff; informing the catering staff and the relevant teaching staff of dietary requirements.
In an emergency where further medical treatment is required: Keep communication and coordination among the team.
Upkeep the first aid boxes around the school.
Take the student(s)/staff to a hospital.
Liaise with the senior leadership team.
Liaise with the parents of the student(s).
Ensure that follow-up contact is made.
Record the incidents. 
Provide and maintain first aid bags for daily and residential excursions.
Assist in delivery health promotion in education. 
Inform the school staff and parents of any government notifications in areas of health.
Attend school meetings.
Attend school seminars, trips, activities and training.
Perform any other duties or responsibilities as assigned by the supervisor
The successful candidates will:

Be a qualified nurse (be registered with the Thailand Nursing Council) with a minimum of two years’ experience working in a hospital or clinic.
Be kind, well mannered and wise as a role model for our students.
Be passionate about helping us replicate the success of King’s College School, Wimbledon in Bangkok by being committed to developing the whole child.
Hold a current medical license.
Be able to obtain a clear criminal record from the Royal Thai Police.
Supply appropriate references from current and previous employers (referees will be contacted by the recruitment team via telephone).
Be a competent user of common business software.
Can-do attitude and be flexible.

The following would also be desirable:

Previous experience in an international school.
An understanding of the international school market in Bangkok.

All staff are expected, in the spirit of teamwork and for the welfare of the school, to perform any other related tasks, within reason, for the department and from time to time support other departments as requested by his/her immediate supervisor.

Please note

King’s College International School Bangkok is fully committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and expects all staff to share this commitment.  Any offer of employment will be subject to the receipt of a criminal records check, suitably translated, satisfactory references, and medical clearance.undefined

Guidance

Professionalism

2. คอนเทนต์ต้องมีไอเดีย การมีไอเดียที่ดี จะตามมาด้วย ยอด Engagement ยอดการกดถูกใจ ยอดผู้ติดตาม คอมเมนต์ หรือยอดแชร์ เพิ่มมากขึ้น จะช่วยทำให้แบรนด์ หรือธุรกิจ เป็นที่รู้จักมากยิ่งขึ้นอีกด้วย
3. ต้องกำหนดเป้าหมายของคอนเทนต์ที่สร้างให้ชัดเจน จะทำแบบไหน ทำแล้วได้อะไร สื่อสารออกมาได้ชัดเจน และต้องรู้จักกลุ่มเป้าหมาย หรือลูกค้าด้วยว่า ต้องการคอนเทนต์แบบไหน
4. ดูแล Social Content ทั้งหมดของบริษัท เช่น YouTube, Facebook, Line, Email, Instagram, TikTok แต่คอนเทนต์ ครีเอเตอร์ ไม่ใช่แอดมินนะ ต้องดูภาพรวมของเนื้อหา Social media Content
5. ต้องสื่อสารกับทีมงาน และบรีฟ Graphic / Copywrite / Video / Voice อยู่เสมอ เพื่อให้งานที่วางแผนไว้ ไปในทิศทางเดียวกัน
6. ต้องดูแลคุณภาพของเนื้อหา ให้มีความถูกต้อง มีความน่าสนใจ การเข้าถึงกลุ่มเป้าหมายได้ง่าย และการวางแผนลงให้ตรงต่อเวลา หรือช่วง Peak ของแต่ละแพลตฟอร์ม จะช่วยสร้าง Engagement ให้เพิ่มขึ้นอีกด้วย
7. เป็นตำแหน่งที่ต้องใช้ความคิดสร้างสรรค์ การคิดนอกกรอบ สร้าง Content ที่เหมาะสม แปลกใหม่ หรือก้าวทันกระแส
8. ต้องมีความเข้าใจ ในผลิตภัณฑ์ของบริษัท วัฒนธรรมองค์กรอย่างดี เพื่อที่จะสามารถเชื่อมโยง Content กับ Marketing concept ได้ผ่านการสร้าง Content ที่ได้วางแผนไว้ เพื่อให้เข้าถึงกลุ่มเป้าหมายของบริษัทได้

IT Management
Directly report to Chief Financial Officer
Passion on Technology and InnovationReignwood Park is seeking an experienced and dynamic IT Manager to join our team. As the IT Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the planning, implementation, and maintenance of our organization's information technology systems. The position will be directly reporting to Chief Financial Officer, and indirectly reporting to heads of business units.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Develop and execute IT strategies aligned with organizational goals.

2. Manage and support the day-to-day operations of the IT department.

3. Ensure the security and integrity of data, networks, and systems.

4. Oversee the selection, implementation, and maintenance of hardware and software solutions.

5. Collaborate with department heads to understand technology needs and provide effective IT solutions.

6. Lead IT projects from conception to completion, ensuring timely delivery and within budget.

7. Stay abreast of industry trends and advancements to recommend innovative solutions.

8. Manage IT staff, providing leadership, guidance, and professional development opportunities.

9. Establish and enforce IT policies, procedures, and standards.

10. Troubleshoot and resolve hardware, software, and network issues promptly.

 Qualifications:

1. Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.

2. Proven experience as an IT Manager or similar role.

3. Strong knowledge of IT systems, infrastructure, and emerging technologies.

4. Experience in project management and ability to lead cross-functional teams.

5. Excellent problem-solving and decision-making skills.

6. Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

7. Knowledge of cybersecurity best practices.

8. Ability to adapt to a fast-paced and evolving technological landscape.

 If you are a strategic thinker with a passion for technology and a proven track record of successful IT management, we invite you to apply and contribute to the technological advancement of Reignwood Park.undefined

Travel agencyJob Description

ทำใบเสนอราคา ขายแพคเกจภายในประเทศไทย หรือ สินค้าและบริการด้านการท่องเที่ยวต่างๆ ที่แผนก Inbound Tour มีขาย กับ Oversea Agency และ รวมไปถึงลูกค้าที่ติดต่อตรงเข้ามายังบริษัท
ปิดการขาย กับ Agency และ ติดตามการชำระเงินค่าสินค้าและบริการ
ดูแลและจัดเก็บข้อมูลฐานลูกค้า ที่ได้มาจากการไปออกบูธ ต่างประเทศ และ ในประเทศ
ทำการจอง โรงแรม ทัวร์ สถานที่ท่องเที่ยว ในโปรแกรมของลูกค้า
ประสานงานและสนับสนุนกับแผนกจัดรถและไกด์
ประสานงานและสนับสนุนกับแผนก Product & Contracting | Product คือ แผนกหลักที่ติดต่อเกี่ยวกับการคิดสร้างสรรค์และพัฒนาสินค้าใหม่ และกิจกรรมต่างๆ ภายในประเทศไทย เป็นต้น | Contracting คือ แผนกหลักที่ติดติดต่อเกี่ยวกับการขอทำสัญญากับคู่ค้า เช่น โรงแรม และกิจกรรมต่างๆ ภายในประเทศไทย เป็นต้น
รับผิดชอบในการติดต่อคู่ค้า และ ทำสัญญา กับโรงแรมที่บริการให้กับทัวร์ต่างชาติ
รับผิดชอบในการติดต่อคู่ค้า และ ทำสัญญา กับสถานที่ท่องเที่ยว รถ ที่บริการให้กับทัวร์ต่างชาติ
ต่อรองราคา เพื่อมาทำโปรโมชั่น ให้เป็นที่แข่งขันในตลาด Inbound Tour
สร้างความสัมพันธ์ กับ คู่ค้า หมายถึง Travel Agency และ คู่สัญญา หมายถึง Supplier & hotel
จัดทำแพคแกจ เพื่อรองรับการขาย และ การเติบโต ของตลาดอินเดีย, ยุโรป, อเมริกา, อาหรับ (UAE, Saudi ) ตลาดเอเชีย เพื่อขายบนแพลตฟอร์ม TRAViZGO Thai Travel Center และ แผนก Inbound ThailandCONNEX
จัดทำแพคเกจ ใหม่ ๆ เพื่อรองรับการเติบโต ในอนาคต และ หา Supplier ใหม่ๆ เพิ่มเติม เพื่อเพิ่มความหลากหลายให้กับบริการของบริษัท
สายด่วน สำหรับ ช่องทางการติดต่อช่วยเหลือ 24/7
ทำใบเสนอราคา และ ประสานงานดูแล ในส่วน MICE (Meeting, Incentive, Conference, Exhibition)
ประสานงานหน่วยงานรัฐบาล และ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง
ทำรายงานยอดขาย ประจำเดือน และ รายงานการทำงานของแผนก Inbound Tour

Industrial robot debugging and configuration
Experience in robotic improvement
Familiarity with automobile welding processPosition: Mechatronics Engineer

Office Location: WHA36 ( 27/1 Village No.2, Pananikom Sub-district, Nikhom Phatthana district,Rayong, 21180)

Employment Type:  Permanent ****

Working Time: Mon-Fri. 08.30am-17.30pm

Website: https://www.byd.com/en-th

Job Summary

We are seeking a skilled Mechatronics Engineer for our Rayong, Thailand office. The successful candidate will be responsible for on-site debugging of industrial robots and robotic arms, leading automation projects, and monitoring equipment performance. With a Bachelor's degree or higher in a relevant field and a minimum of 2 years of experience in the automotive industry, the candidate will bring valuable industry knowledge to the position. Strong communication skills and familiarity with popular robots such as ABB, KUKA etc. are necessary. Experience in the automobile welding process is a plus.

Exciting Roles and Responsibilities
Taking charge of on-site debugging of industrial robots and robotic arms, which includes the initial configuration. This allows you to see the direct results of your work in action.
Leading the overall automation project, putting you in a position to drive progress and make key decisions.
Monitoring the performance of equipment during debugging, providing you with the opportunity to provide insights for continuous quality improvement, and directly influence the quality of our products.
Independently troubleshooting and maintaining technical aspects, allowing you to solve routine technical problems. This role provides a constant challenge and lets you use your problem-solving skills to their fullest extent.
Desirable Qualifications
You should possess a Bachelor's degree or higher in Electrical, Mechanical, Automation or a related field. This will provide a strong foundation for understanding the technical aspects of the role.
We're looking for someone with at least 2 years of experience in the automotive industry, and at least 3 years of experience in robotic improvement. This experience will equip you with the practical skills and industry knowledge necessary for this position.
Familiarity with the applications of mainstream robots such as ABB, KUKA etc. is crucial. This will enable you to work effectively with our equipment and systems.
Strong communication and expression skills are a must. These skills will allow you to collaborate effectively with our team and make your ideas and insights heard.
If you have experience in the automobile welding process, it's a definite plus. This specialized knowledge could prove invaluable in our operations.
What We Offer
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunity to work with a dynamic and innovative team.
Exposure to cutting-edge technology and the chance to shape the future of automation and production.
Professional development and learning opportunities.
A supportive, inclusive, and collaborative work environment.undefined

New Product DevelopmentSSUP HOLDINGS CO., LTD.Job Highlights
Cosmetics OEM background preferred
Strong project management skill
Can do attitude, must be fluent in EnglishJob Scope and Requirements:
A passion for cosmetics is the prerequisite for this job. The ideal candidate must be an avid user of beauty products, both color cosmetics and skin care. In her/ his daily life, she/ he regularly follows IG accounts and all social media movements of international and local beauty brands, follows beauty influencers for beauty updates and tutorials, and stays updated on all new product launches. In her/ his spare time, she/ he shops for cosmetics and toiletries and enjoys testing new products. Below are the job scope details:
Project management: Managing the timeline of new product development to ensure that it is launched on time and with full shipment. This requires project management skill and multi-party problem solving skill. You should be able to come up with contingency plan in the event of unexpected problems and delays.
Developing new product at the required quality and cost: you would need to work with packaging designers and suppliers (primary and secondary packaging), as well as with R&D (in-house or OEM) to come up with a product that matches the quality and cost target set in the new product roadmap.
In-depth understanding of the brand's target consumers: you need to understand the brand's target consumer's insights, their usage behavior, the pains they face in their cosmetics and skin care regime, their influencers, and their willingness to pay for each type of product to be able to create a product that matches with their needs at a price point they are willing to pay. 
Interdepartmental management: You will be working extensively with other departments such as marketing, brand communication, inventory optimization on the brand side, and with purchasing, production planning, R&D, QC/QA etc. on the factory side. Thus you would need to have strong communication and people management skills.
OEM sourcing and supplier management: You will be working with OEM factory sales/ key account managers for products that we buy as semi-finished or finished goods. This requires high proficiency in English business communication.
Most importantly, we want candidates with a positive mindset and a can do attitude. Things do not always go as planned when working with multiple parties, and it takes someone with grit and emotional maturity to thrive in this work scope.  
Qualifications
Cosmetics OEM/ R&D background preferred
Strong project management skill.
Can do attitude, emotionally mature
Must be fluent in English.
New graduates are welcome.

Cost Reduction EngineerEssilor Optical Laboratory (Thailand) co., Ltd.Job Highlights
Cost Reduction Engineer, New Project Engieer
Project management, Cost improvement
The World's Leader Company in Prescription Lenses.Open Position: Cost Reduction Engineer
Working Location: Amata Industrial Estate, Chonburi Province.

About us
Essilor Optical Laboratory (Thailand) Co., Ltd. is part of EssilorLuxottica.
EssilorLuxottica, a fully integrated player, is a global leader in the design, manufacture and distribution of ophthalmic lenses, frames and sunglasses. The company brings together the complementary expertise of two industry pioneers, one in advanced lens technologies and the other in the craftsmanship of iconic eyewear, to create a vertically integrated business that is uniquely positioned to address the world’s evolving vision needs and the global demand of a growing eyewear industry.

Our unique business model and relentless pursuit of operational excellence ensures that consumers everywhere have access to products that have been rigorously tested to meet internationally recognized standards, from the simplest pair of glasses to the most sophisticated custom-made lenses and branded eyewear.
For more information, visit https://www.essilorluxottica.com/overview

Why work with us
People is the key success factor for EssilorLuxottica.
It is the key reason we strive to hire the best, invest in talented people, and develop them to their maximum potential.
To promote employee health and well-being, we offer the following benefits:
￭ Great compensation and benefit
￭ 5 working days a week with Flexible working hours
￭ Health and life insurance
￭ Company shuttle more than 10 routes
￭ Lens and Frames special price for employee
￭ Domestic and international mobility opportunities
￭ Essilor shares for employees with contributions from the company
￭ Wide range of courses, training and career opportunities.
￭ Business casual, diversity and openness work environment. We encourage you to be yourself.



Your day as a Cost Reduction Engineer
This position is responsible for ensuring the organization has a robust cost-estimating process in place to meet production/project requirements and in line with quality.

To do so, you will be in charge of:
￭ In relation with all concerned departments, animate the dashboard of the plant on consumables and raw materials.
￭ Synchronize the plan with managers of other departments, Asia Export Lab Purchasing and Asia Export Lab Manufacturing Excellence.
￭ Support continuous improvement through cost engineering techniques and processes, identifying inefficiencies and cost optimization opportunities
￭ Analyze and identify key areas of improvement and apply cost estimation techniques to drive cost reductions and aid operational processes and efficiency
￭ Monitor and review data and information to detect and assess problems and make recommendations to resolve issues
￭ Manage the realization of all projects, and actions related to cost reduction with the support from Manufacturing Excellence and Asia Purchasing, organize benchmarks with other labs.
￭ Synchronize the new consumables and raw material with new product flow.
￭ Prepare budget by yearly basic with the saving project.


What do we ask from you?
Must have qualifications
￭ Bachelor's degree of Engineering.
￭ At least 6 years of experience in Production functions and/or Engineering functions
￭ Good command of English both writing and speaking.  
￭ Good statistics, analysis and methods skills.
￭ Background in consumable and raw material control and saving.
￭ Background in project management.
￭ Good in communication skills, analytical thinking and prioritization.

Preferable qualifications
￭ Solid technical knowledge of data analysis or business analysis.
￭ Overseas working experience and/or working experience in a Western company is preferable.
￭ Gained TOEIC score above 550 or the similar English proficiency test result is preferable.


We empower our people to create a brighter future.  ..
Every day, EssilorLuxottica’s 180,000 employees in 150 countries work towards a common mission to help people see more and be more.

Associate Business Consultant, B2B FL

Chevron Thailand Limited is accepting online applications for the position of Associate Business Consultant, B2B FL located in Bangkok, Thailand.

General Manager, Supply ChainMeshtec International Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
10 years+ experience in supply chain management
Good command written and spoken in English
Proficient in planning and communication skillsJOBS PURPOSE /TASK

Directing and controlling all operations of supply chain group, procurement, sourcing, strategic material planning, logistics, inventory, storage, and warehouse. Supervise current activities to limited cost, improving accuracy, and increasing effectiveness as well as efficiency. Examine existing procedures or opportunities for streamlining activities to meet product distribution needs and customer’s expectation.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES


Review or update supply chain practices in accordance with new or changing environmental policies, standards, regulations, or laws.
Consider transportation routes and method to maximize cost both inbound and outbound routes.
Ensure the accurate transformation of customer order figures to operation team and related sections.
Diagram supply chain models to help facilitate discussions with customers.
Manage and maintain material costs forecasts or standard cost lists.
Assess appropriate material handling equipment needs and staffing levels to load, unload, move, or store materials.
Appraise vendor manufacturing ability through on-site visits and measurements. Develop or implement procedures or systems to evaluate or select suppliers.
Sourcing or setting alternative suppliers for main material or critical parts.
Negotiate prices and terms with suppliers, vendors, or service providers.
Monitor supplier performance to assess ability to meet quality and delivery requirements.
Monitor forecasts and quotas to identify changes or to determine their effect on supply chain activities.
Meet with suppliers to discuss performance metrics, to provide performance feedback, or to discuss production forecasts or changes.
Implement new or improved supply chain processes.
Collaborate with other departments, such as production, planning, engineering, and quality assurance, to identify or qualify new suppliers.
Confer with customers and production planners to forecast demand or create supply plans that ensure availability of materials or product.
Manage activities related to strategic or tactical purchasing, material requirements planning, inventory control, logistics, warehousing, or receiving.
Design or implement supply chains that support business strategies adapted to changing market conditions, new business opportunities, or cost reduction strategies.

REQUIREMENT:


Bachelor degree in Business Administration or related fields.
At least 10 years experience in Logistics & Supply Chain management
Planning & organizing, analytical skill, problem solving.
High responsibilities, fast learning, self-motivated and Initiative.
Good in communication skill both Thai and English.
BENEFITS:


Provident Fund
Accident Insurance
Life Insurance
Variable bonus
Fitness roomundefined

Senior Trade Marketing OfficerM.S. HANAZONO (THAILAND) CO., LTD.Job Highlights
สำรวจการตลาดของแบรนด์คู่แข่ง
ดูแลอุปกรณ์ส่งเสริมการขายแต่ละโปรโมชั่น
Master Promotion PlanJob Description

1.งานด้านโปรโมชั่นส่งเสริมการขาย
        1.1.ดูแลภาพรวม และผลักดันโปรโมชั่นส่งเสริมการขายให้เป็นไปตามแผนการตลาดหลัก (Master Promotion Plan) ของแต่ละแบรนด์
       1.2.ประสานงานภายในเพื่อดำเนินการด้านโปรโมชั่น
               - ร่วมทำการ Forecast และ Follow Up ตัวเลขกับฝ่ายการตลาดและฝ่ายขาย
               - ประมาณการสั่งสินค้าล่วงหน้า เช็ครอบสินค้าเข้ากับฝ่าย Demand planning
               - คิดรูปแบบการจัดชุดเซ็ต,  พันแถม, แจ้ง Barcode กับจัดซื้อและคลังสินค้า
               - ติดต่อ Supplier ข้างนอก เพื่อจัดหาสินค้าแถมพรีเมียมต่างๆ และงานเอกสารสั่งผลิต กับจัดซื้อ
2.งานคิดวิเคราะห์สรุปผลโปรโมชั่น
       2.1.Follow Up ข้อมูลด้านยอดขายทั้ง Sell-in Sell Out, avg, Sales result ของทุกโปรโมชั่น และทุกลูกค้าที่เข้าร่วม เพื่อนำมาวิเคราะห์ Promotion Effectiveness พร้อมจัดทำรายงานสรุปผล
       2.2. สำรวจหน้าร้าน และศึกษากิจกรรม/โปรโมชั่นแบรนด์คู่แข่ง
       2.3 เสนอไอเดียเพิ่มยอดขาย พร้อมปรับแผนโปรโมชั่นรายเดือน / รายไตรมาสตามความเหมาะสม และสามารถแข่งขันในตลาดได้
3. จัดทำอุปกรณ์ส่งเสริมการขาย
       3.1.ดูแลอุปกรณ์ส่งเสริมการขายแต่ละโปรโมชั่น เช่น Catalog, Leaflet, Wobbler, POP แนะนำสินค้า, สินค้าพรีเมี่ยม (ของแถม กล่อง ถุง)
       3.2. ประสานงานกับจัดซื้อเพื่อสั่งผลิตและ FS team เพื่อกระจายอุปกรณ์ส่งเสริมการขายสู่หน้าร้าน
4.ดูแลภาพ และ โปรโมชั่นการจัดอีเว้นท์ และ พื้นที่พิเศษต่างๆเพื่อผลักดัน  และ กระตุ้นยอดขายให้กับแบรนด์
5. เตรียมสินค้า  และ ข้อมูลโปรโมชั่นส่งเสริมการขายให้กับฝ่ายขาย
6. ปรับภาพลักษณ์การจัดเรียงสินค้าในรูปแบบตู้ต่างๆ
7. การควบคุม ดูแลผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชา

Benefits

Five-day work week
Provident Fund
Dental care
Group Accident Insurance
Child tuition
Employee price products
Bonus
Vacation 16 days/yearundefined

Cyber Security Analyst/Cyber Security AnalystUniversity of The Thai Chamber of CommerceJob Highlights
Analytical and problem-solving skills are requir
Knowledge of network traffic analysis methods.
Experience in IT Security, Network SecurityDuties and Responsibilities:

Validates, classifies, priorities and opens ticket.
Acting as focal contact point for report security incidents.
Document and escalate incidents (including event's history, status, and potential impact for further action) that may cause ongoing and immediate impact to the environment.
Provide daily summary reports of security incidents.
Responds to security alerts generate within the SLA time window.
Follow-up and tracking security incidents base on team process.
Examine network topologies to understand data flows through the network.
Validate security incidents alerts against network traffic using packet analysis tools.
Isolate or remove malware.
Identify applications and operating systems of a network device based on network traffic.
Assist in the construction of signatures which can be implemented on cyber defense network tools in response to new or observed threats within the network environment or enclave.
Notify cybersecurity service provider team members of suspected cyber incidents, status, and potential impact for further action in accordance with the organization's cyber incident response plan.
Work with stakeholders to resolve computer security incidents and vulnerability compliance.
Qualifications:

Knowledge of computer networking concepts and protocols, and network security methodologies.
Analytical and problem-solving skills are required.
Knowledge of network traffic analysis methods.
Knowledge of cyber defense and information security policies, procedures, and regulations.
Experience in IT Security, Network Security or Security Compliance.
Knowledge of common security tools such as anti-virus, firewall and intrusion detection system.
Knowledge of network protocols such as TCP/IP, Dynamic Host Configuration, Domain Name System (DNS), and directory services.
Work with professional, friendly & supportive team.undefined

Consumer Insights & Market Intelligence ManagerELCA (Thailand) Ltd.Job Highlights
Consumer insight/market/social/competitor analysis
Experience in related business or marketing agency
Skill on data analysis tool, database managementAbout This Role:

Be The Cosmetics Market Guru

The CIMI Manager is highly regarded as the one who know the cosmetic market thoroughly. By identifying the trends that influence the prestige cosmetic markets such as the consumer behavior, competitive landscape, or other external factors. This person will be the one who analyze the potential impact on ELC’ s competitiveness and market positioning.

The Intelligence Curator & Insights Creator

The CIMI Manager will be the reliable provider for the ELC’ s teams on the insights & intelligence from the compilation of internal insights such as the CRM database, Bas, to the external systematic market data like Beaute Research, Euromonitor, as well as self-curated information from the non-formal sources like the social media or consumer forums. In case of specific insights required, this CIMI manager will help filling the gap by conducting consumer studies project that leads to the marketing actions.

Actions Navigator

This person will work as a trusted partner with brand teams and other stakeholders to turn the insights and intelligence into actions, guide the course of marketing plan, setup and evaluating the results.

Key Responsibility

Continuously monitor market data, consumer’ s cosmetic usage behavior trends, social insights, internal data to acquire intelligence on market movement and competitive landscape.
Provide regular monitoring report and analysis of competitor activities and identify threat/ opportunities/ gaps for ELC brands.
Conduct regular analysis of market data, identify the critical points and come up with recommendation
Work as a project manager on consumer studies – from identifying the requirement, plan the budget/timeline, brief the research agencies, coordinate the fieldwork, through to the reporting and define actions
Work closely with the regional & global ELC team on the CI/MI projects like the consumer studies or the launch of new tools
Engage the brand teams and related stakeholders on the market intelligence and insights through the presentations, meetings, and other means of distributions
Develop recommendation for brands’ marketing action from the intelligence/insights, and work collaboratively with brands to plan and evaluate the related actions.
Learn and master the related ELC’ s CI/MI tools. Guide the teams on using the tools to apply for their marketing planning needs.
Provide consult with brand teams on the key marketing decision-making needs
Collaborate with the CRM/Analytic team to conduct data analytics project

Qualifications

Graduated master degree in Marketing, Economics , Business Administration, MIS, or related fields
At least 5 years of working experience with background in marketing planning, data analytics, with the intensive use of data.
Possess analytical skill to turn data into the meaningful intelligence and recommendation
Has a systematic thinking capability, is a good problem solver, fast learner
Experienced in working with or supervising the marketing research agencies
Candidate’s experiences in the following industries will be given extra consideration: prestige cosmetics, retail, FMCG, CRM agency, marketing research agency, marketing consultant firm
Demonstrate agility to work in the ELC’s fast-pacing environment
Fluid communication and presentation skills in Thai and English. Excel in writing and speaking communication, with the ability to well-articulate the complex information.
Possess energetic character, with positive attitude, and great interpersonal skill
Skill on using data analysis tool, database management is a must.undefined

Product Development Marketing Manager - KonnetKonvy International Co., Ltd.Job Highlights
Product Marketing Development
Initiate new product and strategies
Market ResearchWe are seeking a passionate and experienced Product Marketing Manager to join our dynamic team at Konnet, a leading developer of innovative products with competitive advantage to meet customer needs. As a Product Marketing Manager, you will play a crucial role in identifying new product opportunities, conducting competitor analysis and surveys, developing and implementing go-to-market strategies, and overseeing the entire product lifecycle from development to launch. You will be responsible for ensuring that our products are successfully introduced to the market and achieve their full potential.




Responsibilities:


Lead the product development team: Spearhead the creation of innovative products with compelling selling points for the market.
Build the roadmap and product pipeline: Develop a comprehensive roadmap, presenting it to upper management while analyzing customer needs, market trends, potential partnerships, and ROI.
Seek new opportunities: Evaluate current competitors and assess market situations to identify strategic opportunities.
Initiate key selling points: Define and oversee the creation of compelling product narratives, ensuring effective copywriting.
Design product selling points: Analyze new products based on market needs, our identity, direct competitors, and consumer preferences.
Identify new product opportunities: Conduct thorough market research to discover unmet customer needs and trends within the cosmetic industry.
Conduct competitor analysis: Analyze the competitive landscape to pinpoint opportunities for differentiating our products.
Develop and implement go-to-market strategies: Create comprehensive strategies aligning with overall marketing objectives for successful product launches.
Develop and manage marketing materials: Craft compelling marketing materials that effectively communicate the value proposition of our products.
Stay up-to-date on industry trends: Continuously monitor industry trends and developments to adapt strategies accordingly.
New design: Establish design requirements based on briefs from internal and external teams.

Qualifications:


Bachelor's degree in marketing, business administration, or a related field.
5+ years of experience in product marketing or a related field.
Proven experience in identifying new product opportunities and conducting market research.
Strong understanding of competitor analysis and go-to-market strategies.
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Passion for the cosmetic industry and a deep understanding of consumer trends.undefined

Warehouse operation
Logistics & Supply ChainTop reasons why to join with us?

DECATHLON may still be a name that is not very familiar to Thai people because this sport equipment brand from France has just officially opened in Thailand in 2015 or just 6 years ago, despite the fact that DECATHLON has been established for more than 44 years. Decathlon will become a favorite multi-purpose sports equipment brand in Thailand ... Why? Because here we sell products that are both good quality and cheap. However, Decathlon, a brand founded in Lille, the north of France has a completely different look because this brand does not have a beautiful storefront. Everything is designed as simple as possible to reduce costs as much as possible to provide products at low price and accessible to everyone. We find ways to produce and sell sporting goods under the concept of "producing the best sports equipment at the best price". The secret to Decathlon bargains is to invest in every step of the way. From research, design, production, transportation and having own store to minimize costs. In order to be able to sell products at the lowest price possible, Decathlon always invest in research and product development. Set up a base for researching different types of sports equipment in the sports area, such as water sports, near the sea and hiking sports near the mountains. It is centered on SportsLab with thousands of professionals. Each of them is constantly trying to find ways to improve the quality of Decathlon products. Decathlon also believes that no one knows more deeply about each item than the customer who buy it for their own use. Therefore, we provide a way for customers to come up with ideas to keep improving our products and continue to develop better product. With the marketing approach "High quality Economical" simple but at same time with high performance, Decathlon has soared to become one of the world's top multi-sport brands. In Decathlon store we have more than 60 kinds of sports apparel and equipment, all in one place for everyone in the family.

Senior Maintenance PlannerALSTOM (Thailand) Ltd.Job Highlights
Mechanical, Aerospace Engineering or related
Global Business
Challenging Project ManagementAt Alstom, we understand transport networks and what moves people. From high-speed trains, metros, monorails, and trams, to turnkey systems, services, infrastructure, signalling and digital mobility, we offer our diverse customers the broadest portfolio in the industry. Every day, 74,000 colleagues lead the way to greener and smarter mobility worldwide, connecting cities as we reduce carbon and replace cars.

Could you be the full-time Senior Maintenance Planner in Bangkok we’re looking for?

Your future role

Take on a new challenge and apply your engineering expertise in a new cutting-edge field. You’ll work alongside passionate, motivated and dedicated teammates.

You'll support the Fleet Planning Manager in managing the short to long term planning for all aspects of services operation. Day-to-day, you’ll work closely with teams across the business support the coordination of activities directly related to contractual deliverables and availability as well as any other performance related obligations and much more.

You’ll specifically take care of planning associated with but not limited to, materials, headcount, depot facilities, tooling, risk, delivery, operations and the customer. 

We’ll look to you for:

Development, Maintenance and execution of a detailed plan and budget.
Day to day coordination and direction of planning related activities across multiple functions.
Management of the contractual deliverable related to load, capacity and delivery.
Transparent and clear communication between colleagues and across departments.

All about you

We value passion and attitude over experience. That’s why we don’t expect you to have every single skill. Instead, we’ve listed some that we think will help you succeed and grow in this role: 

Degree in Engineer, Electrical Engineering, Electronic Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Aerospace Engineering or related field
Typically, minimum 5 years relevant experience
In depth understanding of load and capacity planning, lean concepts and six sigma, operational knowledge of vehicle maintenance, data analytics skills, materials management knowledge including the “just in time” concepts. Solid reputation on cost reduction and process improvement with particular focus on headcount efficiencies and creative production principles.
In addition to this, has sound understanding of concepts and procedures in product safety and a good knowledge in related disciplines
Disciplines include; Project Requirements Documentation, Contract Deliverable documents and Supplier Contract Arrangements, Vehicle Operational and Maintenance Regimes, Vehicle Maintenance Schedule, Maximo/Intraxis/Burst, Maintainability, Availability and Life Cycle Costs, Condition Based Maintenance, Incident Management Procedure, BT Safety Management Systems, Penalty Modelling and Contractual Reliability Regime, Requirements Management Tool, Requirements Management Process, Cost Benefit Analysis, Duane Modelling, Fault Tree Analysis Methodology inc. Common Mode Failures and Human Reliability, Tool, Reliability Requirements Definition, Goal Structured Notation.

Things you’ll enjoy

Join us on a life-long transformative journey – the rail industry is here to stay, so you can grow and develop new skills and experiences throughout your career. You’ll also:

Enjoy stability, challenges and a long-term career free from boring daily routines
Collaborate with transverse teams and helpful colleagues
Contribute to innovative projects
Utilise our hybrid working environment
Steer your career in whatever direction you choose across functions and countries
Benefit from our investment in your development, through award-winning learning
Benefit from a fair and dynamic reward package that recognises your performance and potential, plus comprehensive and competitive social coverage

Important to note

As a global business, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that celebrates diversity across the 70+ countries we operate in. We’re committed to creating an inclusive workplace for everyone.undefined

Accountant will be responsible for managing day-to-day accounting operations of SW’s clients, including maintaining financial records, preparing financial statements, ensuring compliance with accounting standards and regulations, and preparing taxes.

Manage the accounting operations of SW's clients, including accounts payable and receivable, payroll, and general ledger accounting.

Strong knowledge of Thai GAAP and tax laws.
Experience with accounting software and systems, such as Express or Xero.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Fluent in Thai and English, both spoken and written.
SW Thailand is an audit, accounting and business advisory company. With our head office in Bangkok and a branch in Phuket and Khon Kaen, we provide accounting, auditing, tax planning, corporate service and business advisory for both Thai and foreign companies. With our specialization in business compliance and assurance, SW Thailand aims at exceeding your expectations by providing exceptional services to both international and local clientele.

SW Thailand is a sole representative in Thailand for the SW International (IAB Top 20 global ranking accounting firms), the biggest accounting and auditing firm in China with worldwide network of member firms in Australia, Chile, Egypt, Germany, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Japan, Macau, Malaysia, Pakistan, Singapore, Spain, Taiwan, Turkey, UAE, and United Kingdom with total 45 offices and over 30,000 staffs.undefined

High personal integrity, confidentiality, positive thinking and flexible approach to work.
Attention to detail, deadline-oriented and professional attitude to work.
Interested in conservation works with international conservation NGO.

Associate Manager- Global Projects and SpecificationsKohler (Thailand) Public Company LimitedJob Highlights
Bachelor's Degree in architectural or design
exp working in design firms and/or key account
Strong verbal and written and presentation in Eng As a Senior Associate / Assistant Manager at Kohler Kitchen and Bath, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of our brand in local and international markets, with a focus on brand-building project development opportunities. You will be responsible for building and nurturing relationships with key stakeholders, including developers, architects, interior designers, and hotel operators, to drive specification recommendations for our products and secure projects. Your goal is to become a brand ambassador, industry expert, and a trusted partner for our key customers, converting them into advocates and loyalists and winning international projects through the stakeholders you engage.

In this position, you will report to the Associate Director, Global Projects & Specifications, SEA/Thailand, who will provide guidance and support in achieving our collective goals.

 Role and Responsibility

       Brand Ambassador: Promote the Kohler brand and products as an industry expert and win on strategic product categories. Ability to represent the Kohler brand with sophistication and conviction to business partners professionally.
       Relationship Building: Develop and maintain strong, strategic relationships with key customers, including cross-region developers, architects, interior designers, and hotel operators.
       Specification Recommendations: Understand customer needs and recommend Kohler Kitchen and Bath products for inclusion in their projects. Leverage your design background and aesthetic sense to provide expert advice and technical support in product selection.
       Market Expansion: Identify and pursue opportunities for market expansion, both locally and internationally, aligning with the company’s overall strategic plans. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create tailored solutions for customers.
       Project Communicator: Collaborate with customers, internal teams, and partners to support the execution of projects, ensuring well-considered proposal delivery on-time and close follow through to completion.
       Advocate Conversion: Work closely with key customers to transform them into advocates and loyalists, promoting long-term partnerships.
       Project Acquisition: Identify and secure international projects through engagement with developers, architects, and interior designers. Act as the primary point of contact for project stakeholders.

Qualifications

       Bachelor's Degree or higher degree in architectural or design-related field preferred.
       Proven experience working in design firms and/or key account management, or specification sales, preferably in the sanitary fittings/wares or luxury products industry.
       Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, conversant in working cross-culturally.
       Possess/acquire excellent product knowledge and be able to speak in the language of international caliber designers.
       Self-driven, self-disciplined, and goal-oriented
       Strategic thinking, negotiation, and problem-solving abilities.
       Proficiency in the Salesforce will be an advantage.
       Existing network base with B2B designers preferred.
       Strong verbal and written communication and presentation skills in English and Thai with Putonghua will be plus point.
 All applications will be treated strictly confidential
We offer attractive remuneration packages and extensive career opportunities and training to the successful candidates.

Recruitment – Human Resource
Kohler (Thailand) Public Company Limited

16th Floor, Jasmine City, 2 Soi Sukhumvit 23, Sukhumvit Rd., Bangkok 10110
Tel: 0-2204-6000 Fax: 0-2204-6299

- สามารถใช้ภาษาอังกฤษในการสื่อสารได้ จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

- กิจกรรมภายในบริษัท

Senior Logistics Specialist
Logistics Assistant Manager

This position is provided Logistics Lead for all warehousing & logistics functions in Asia. It will ensure goods & services planned flow from supplier to hub and/or loading port and ensure cost-effectiveness and service delivery (DOT) performance in a way that meets quality specifications (DIFOT) – Operational lead. Furthermore, the role has an innovation & simplification focus, around Logistics solutions. The position will also champion pick from hub, pick from factory and hinterland logistics innovations to support to support DOT and cost initiatives. Moreover, this position will build major collaborative partnerships with logistics service providers & internal business functional teams, play a leading role to bring digitization of logistics milestones & data integrity in Hanes system, and lead Cost Stewardship of logistics spend at all origins.

Job Activities:



Deliverables

Manage Logistics SOP as well as improve and simplify the system.
Develop a Logistics schedules and visual reports, detailing all tasks.
Focus on container fill rate improvements.
Collaborate with third party providers in Hub Management.
Expected to take project lead in Projects looking at increase Logistics efficiency.
Primary Accountabilities

Management of carrier allocations.
Origin/Destination Management flow from Factory to Hub/Port. Overview of supplier to port movements and insight around which destination port to unload.
Ensure booking & documentation processes to facilitate freight flows to the destination points.
Manage and control cost to service at Pick from factory (PFF) and Pick from hub (PFH) points.
Lead continuous improvements to review Pick from factory (PFF) and Pick from hub (PFH) activities.
Quality management: lead in ensuring the packaging of the product supports stock flow in destination warehouses.
Manage all communication on flow from factory and hub. Role must be across operational timelines and relay this to the business to ensure DOT is met.
Alternatives supporting off-shore picking – view on online fulfilment and stock holding alternatives to control end to end supply chain costs.
Manage any concerns/risks around sea and air carriers timing and delivery.
Systems update and use of visual control system to track in-to-store and delivery points to the delivery points.
Analyze freight spending, logistics cost saving, and container fill rate by running the report.
Conduct a weekly meeting with logistics provider to review the performance based on the key indicators.
Ensure the regulatory compliance to organizational standards.
Monitor and provide feedback to managed staff to effect improvements in organizational goals.





Knowledge and Experience Requirements:

Experience:


Bachelor's Degree in Logistics, Supply Chain, International Business, or related.
Obtained at least 5 years experience in Manufacturing, Logistics, Operational Roles (International Logistics / Import Export / local transportation, customs formalities, and Free Trade Agreement)
Skills:

Excellent in oral and written English.
Strong combination of business and technical knowledge base, particularly for specific transportation spend and cost variables.
Strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities.
Strong influencing skills
Strong abilities in working with internal and external partners. 
Competent Characteristics Required to Accomplish Primary Accountabilities:

Cross-functional skills to integrate different parts of the organization, extending outside of the traditional Logistics services model.
Commercial Acumen: Knowledge in current and future policies, trends and technology.
Innovation Management: Need to bring creative ideas around Logistics opportunities to the market.
Action Oriented: Ability to set the plan and work towards completion.
Priority Setting: Understand the role and part played by others in the team to achieve the set goals.

Restaurant Manager / Assistant Manager / Bar Manager/ผู้จัดการร้านอาหาร / ผู้จัดการช่วย / ผู้จัดการบาร์Cento BangkokJob Highlights
New Restaurant. Management positions
Fluent in English and Thai
3+ years experience. Passionate about peopleWHO ARE WE?

Welcome to Cento Bangkok, a dynamic and vibrant addition to the restaurant scene, set to open its doors in February. We are not just a restaurant; we are a community-driven establishment committed to creating memorable experiences through culinary excellence and unparalleled service.

Passionate about People

At Cento Bangkok, our heartbeat is people, and we mean it. We are driven by a profound passion for individuals and their development, both within our team and in the broader community. We believe that every person is an integral part of our success story, and we are dedicated to fostering an environment where growth, creativity, and collaboration flourish.

Proven Experience

Behind Cento Bangkok is a team with a rich history in the restaurant industry. With a combined experience of over 30 restaurant openings, we bring a wealth of knowledge and a track record of success. Our seasoned professionals understand the intricacies of the hospitality business and are committed to making Cento Bangkok a benchmark for excellence. And a great place to work at.

You will be working directly with the founder to design a people-centric organization to be ready to welcome more than 25 new team members joining in February.

YOUR ROLE

Embark on an exciting journey to shape the heart of our restaurant. Collaborate with our founder to set dynamic guest-driven standards, drive people operations, and passionately care for our team. Be the catalyst for a vibrant workplace where talent flourishes. Oversee, direct, and coordinate the planning, organizing, training, and leadership necessary to run a people-centric organization.

As a Restaurant Manager, your main duties will be:

Supporting the different department's recruitment needs
Managing day-to-day operations, and supervising our high standards.
Creating training manuals in collaboration with our founder.
Weekly rostering and holiday management
Liaising with vendors for any purchases needed to run day-to-day operations (dry cleaners, glassware orders, POS, napkins, etc.)
Onboarding of new team members.
Ensuring our teams are happy while working with us, having daily conversations with them.
Daily management of employee relations such as control of leaves, payroll, etc., in collaboration with our HR department.
Ensuring all our team members have access to all the training and evaluating progress in their careers.

As Bar Manager, your main duties will be:

Design our Italian classics-inspired bar menu in collaboration with our founder 
Deliver superlative drinks to our guests 
Manage the inventory and orders 
Develop the drinks cost and recipes with our founder's support 

As an Assistant Manager, your main duties will be:

Support the restaurant manager on the day-to-day operations 
Look after our people, ensure we create a fantastic working environment 
Process small Purchases to keep the restaurant up-to-date 
Support the training of our teams 
Ensure the venue is kept in perfect condition
Stock takes

QUALIFICATIONS:

Bachelor’s Degree or higher in any field (Restaurant manager only) 
At least 3 years of direct experience in recruiting team members (Restaurant manager only) 
At least 5 years of direct experience in managing a high-volume restaurant (Restaurant manager only) 
Proficient user of all Microsoft Office applications, office equipment, and communications equipment (Restaurant manager only) 
Fluent in both Thai and English
Passionate about making the lives of our people better.
Experience with wines and spirits will be a big plus. ( A must for the bar Manager position) 
The ideal candidates should be able to start end of January / Beginning of February, as the restaurant is set to open on February 20th 

MORE INFORMATION:

Location: No. 120 Soi Sala Daeng 1/1, Silom Sub-district, Bang Rak District, Bangkok 10500
All applications must be in English 
You will be contacted via email to arrange an interview, please expect our email, we are excited to talk to you! 

BENEFITS:

Restaurant open for dinner only, focus on a high-quality shift
6 days off a month 
Medical
Meals are offered on duty.
Restaurant staff discount 50%
Compensation: Very open, depending on experience, we are looking for the right candidate and we want to ensure they are well looked after
Service charges & tips 
On-job training. Daily food, wine and cocktails tasting. We are committed to your development undefined

Internship - Sustainable Development (Fisheries/ Animal Sciences)/นักศึกษาฝึกงาน - การพัฒนาความยั่งยืน (ประมง/ สัตวศาสตร์)THAI UNION GROUP PCL.Job Highlights
Fisheries - Postgraduate/ Undergraduate student
Good/ Moderate command of English
Working onsite (SM Tower, BTS Sanampao)Assignment background:

Thai Union recently started a project to promote responsible and prudent use of antibiotics among Thai shrimp farms. We aim to develop clear sets of principles, design and pilot interventions in the selected farms and create clear assessment metrics and KPIs to measure and report on the progress of responsible usage of antibiotics. This project was initiated as part of our commitment to improve aquaculture sustainability and also our commitment to reduce use of antibiotics in aquaculture supply chain under the Seafood Business for Ocean Stewardship (SeaBOS)’s Antibotics Stewardship Roadmap

In collaboration with our team of consultants, we have now identified an intervention strategy. We are in the process of developing an educational program designed for farmers, aimed at raising awareness and empowering them to make well-informed decisions regarding the prudent and responsible use of antibiotics in shrimp farms. Our initial pilot phase will involve working with approximately 20 farms, where we will conduct training sessions.

The learnings of this activity would help identify the areas of opportunity where Thai Union can address further, including but not limited to formulating corporate policy and guideline on antibiotics usage as well as working with farmers and external partners for a better compliance of antibiotics usage.

Responsibilities:

Research and Data Analysis: Conduct research on responsible use of antibiotics in shrimp farms, industry best practices, and relevant regulations. Assist in data collection and analysis to inform program development.
Program Materials Development: Collaborate with the project team to create educational materials, presentations, and training resources for farmers.
Training Support: Help organize and facilitate training sessions with farmers, including logistical arrangements and documentation of sessions.
Progress Tracking: Maintain detailed records of project activities, assist in monitoring progress, and prepare regular reports.
Documentation: Assist in documenting lessons learned and best practices during the pilot phase.
Administrative Support: Provide general administrative support as needed, including scheduling, correspondence, and other tasks related to the project.
Qualifications:

Undergraduate or Postgraduate strudent with field of study in Fisheries or related to Animal Sciences (คณะ/สาขา/ภาควิชา ประมง, สัตวศาสตร์ หรืออื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง)
Good/ Moderate command of Englishundefined

New Product Development - Oriental PrincessSSUP HOLDINGS CO., LTD.Job Highlights
Cosmetics OEM background preferred
Strong project management skill
At least 2 years experienceJob Scope and Requirements:
A passion for cosmetics is the prerequisite for this job. The ideal candidate must be an avid user of beauty products, both color cosmetics and skin care. In her/ his daily life, she/ he regularly follows IG accounts and all social media movements of international and local beauty brands, follows beauty influencers for beauty updates and tutorials, and stays updated on all new product launches. In her/ his spare time, she/ he shops for cosmetics and toiletries and enjoys testing new products. Below are the job scope details:
Project management: Managing the timeline of new product development to ensure that it is launched on time and with full shipment. This requires project management skill and multi-party problem solving skill. You should be able to come up with contingency plan in the event of unexpected problems and delays.
Developing new product at the required quality and cost: you would need to work with packaging designers and suppliers (primary and secondary packaging), as well as with R&D (in-house or OEM) to come up with a product that matches the quality and cost target set in the new product roadmap.
In-depth understanding of the brand's target consumers: you need to understand the brand's target consumer's insights, their usage behavior, the pains they face in their cosmetics and skin care regime, their influencers, and their willingness to pay for each type of product to be able to create a product that matches with their needs at a price point they are willing to pay. 
Interdepartmental management: You will be working extensively with other departments such as marketing, brand communication, inventory optimization on the brand side, and with purchasing, production planning, R&D, QC/QA etc. on the factory side. Thus you would need to have strong communication and people management skills.
OEM sourcing and supplier management: You will be working with OEM factory sales/ key account managers for products that we buy as semi-finished or finished goods. This requires high proficiency in English business communication.
Most importantly, we want candidates with a positive mindset and a can do attitude. Things do not always go as planned when working with multiple parties, and it takes someone with grit and emotional maturity to thrive in this work scope.  
Qualifications
Cosmetics OEM/ R&D background preferred
At least 2 years experience.
Strong project management skill.
Can do attitude, emotionally mature
Must be fluent in English.undefined

Operation Engineer (Electrical) - Wastewater TreatmentVinarco Services (Thailand) LimitedJob Highlights
Equipment Maintenance /Troubleshooting/ Treatment
Reliability/Efficiency of electrical systems
Treatment Process and Environmental ProtectionPosition: Operation Engineer

Type of hiring: Permanent
Location: Bangkok

Responsibilities: The role of an Electrical Operation Engineer in a wastewater treatment company is essential for maintaining the reliability and efficiency of electrical systems critical to the treatment process and environmental protection.

Equipment Maintenance and Troubleshooting:
Oversee the maintenance, repair, and troubleshooting of electrical equipment and systems used in wastewater treatment processes, such as pumps, motors, control panels, and instrumentation.
Perform regular inspections and preventive maintenance to ensure equipment operates efficiently and safely.
Diagnose and address electrical faults, failures, and malfunctions in a timely manner to minimize downtime.

Process Monitoring and Control:
Monitor the performance of electrical systems that control and automate wastewater treatment processes.
Adjust control parameters and settings to optimize process efficiency, ensure compliance with environmental regulations, and maintain treatment quality.

Emergency Response:
Develop and implement contingency plans for electrical equipment failures or emergencies to minimize disruptions to the treatment process.
Respond quickly and effectively to critical situations to prevent environmental and operational risks.

Safety and Compliance:
Ensure that all electrical systems and equipment are installed and operated in compliance with relevant safety codes, standards, and regulations.
Participate in safety audits and inspections to identify potential hazards and implement corrective actions.

Documentation and Reporting:
Maintain accurate records of equipment maintenance, repairs, and modifications.
Prepare reports detailing equipment performance, maintenance activities, and any incidents or issues.

Training and Development:
Provide training and guidance to operational staff on electrical systems, safety protocols, and proper maintenance procedures.
Stay updated on industry trends, technological advancements, and best practices related to electrical systems in wastewater treatment.

Collaboration and Communication:
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including process engineers, maintenance technicians, and management, to ensure smooth operation of the treatment facility.
Communicate effectively with team members and superiors regarding equipment status, maintenance schedules, and any potential issues.

Energy Efficiency and Optimization:
Identify opportunities to improve energy efficiency within the wastewater treatment process through electrical system upgrades and optimizations.
Implement energy-saving initiatives while maintaining treatment effectiveness.

Continuous Improvement:
Identify areas for process improvement and cost reduction within the electrical operations.
Propose and implement innovative solutions to enhance equipment performance and operational efficiency.

Budget and Resource Management:
Assist in budget planning and resource allocation for electrical maintenance and operations.
Manage inventory of spare parts and supplies required for electrical equipment maintenance.

New Projects and Installations:
Participate in the design, installation, and commissioning of new electrical systems and equipment for expansion or upgrades of the wastewater treatment facility.

Environmental Stewardship:
Contribute to the company's environmental goals by ensuring the proper functioning of electrical systems that play a crucial role in maintaining water quality and compliance.


Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or related field.
Minimum 3 years of experience as an Operation Engineer in wastewater treatment works or related field.
Have H&S Certificate - Confined Space and Safety Officer Technical level.
Good command of English (Writing, Listening, and Speaking ).
Able to work under pressure and in teams.undefined
